Posts.Content: nettalkin wrote: a few months ago I found a lump under my right umderarm towards the front, I finally went to my doctor and he seemed unconcerned, didn't know what it was but he didnt want to do anything about it but sent me for a mamogram which did not locate the lump, I said some to the to the technition she was surprised my doctor did not mention to have it looked at reguardless the radialogist decided to do an U/S after the tech did this she looked puzzled and went to get the Radialogist to look he too looked puzzled then said we need to remove it, I then was sent to a surgeon who is also puzzled asks me if I have had any infections in my hand or arm, then says well it could be a fat thing , after i told him no. they don't know what it is but they are quick to tell me their opinions I am not looking for bad news just wish if they don't know then say so and dont try and guess. My question is has anyone ever heard of this and what you may know, for some reason either all the doctors I have seen this past 2 weeks live in a box or just don't want to say. I am having surgery the 20th to have this removed which the surgeon asked me if I wanted to have it done OMG someone please help me. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: underarm lump nettalkin Beesie
